Reference

All functions

all_species_control()

All species control

check_species_catch_ocean()

Gives the inconsistencies between the species fished and the ocean reported for the trip

fate_by_species_group_control()

Fate by species control

fate_by_species_group_correction()

Fate by species group correction

fate_unknown_control()

Fate unknown control

file_path_checking()

Checking for file path

logbook_activity_sample_control()

Gives inconsistencies between the sample and the activity in terms of presence

logbook_anapo_activity_control()

Gives the inconsistencies between the VMS and the presence of activity

logbook_anapo_control()

Gives the inconsistencies activity position and VMS position

logbook_category_species_forbidden_well_control()

Gives the inconsistencies between the weight categories and the species in the well

logbook_distribution_control()

Gives the inconsistencies between the weights of small and big sample fish and the sum of the small and big weights in the associated well

logbook_eez_control()

Gives the inconsistencies between the fishing area declared and calculated for the activity

logbook_fishing_context_control()

Gives the inconsistencies between the school type and the association

logbook_fishing_time_control()

Gives the inconsistencies between the sum of the fishing times indicated for the route and the one indicated for the trip

logbook_floating_object_buoy_id_redundancy_control()

Identification of incoherent buoy operation on a same object

logbook_harbour_control()

Gives the inconsistencies between the harbour of landing of the previous trip and the harbour of departure of the current trip

logbook_landing_control()

Gives the inconsistencies between the total landed weight for canneries and local market in the trip and vessel capacity link to trip

logbook_landing_total_weight_control()

Gives the inconsistencies between the total weight landed during the trip for the canneries and the sum of the weights of each landing for the canneries linked to the trip

logbook_ldlf_control()

Gives the inconsistencies between the sample measurement types and species or weight values

logbook_length_class_control()

Gives the inconsistencies between size class of the samples depending on the species and measurement type and the valid threshold

logbook_little_big_control()

Gives the inconsistencies between the percentage of little and big fish sampled

logbook_measure_control()

Gives the inconsistencies between the total number of individuals measured per sample and the sum of individuals per sample, species and size class

logbook_operation_control()

Gives the inconsistencies between fishing success status, vessel activity, type of school or weight caught

logbook_position_control()

Gives the inconsistencies between the ocean declared for the trip and the position of the activity

logbook_raising_factor_control()

Gives the inconsistencies between RF1 and threshold values

logbook_sample_harbour_control()

Gives inconsistencies between the presence of a sample and the absence of a harbour of landing

logbook_sample_without_measure_control()

Gives inconsistencies between the sample and the measurement in terms of presence

logbook_sample_without_species_control()

Gives inconsistencies between the sample and the species sampled in terms of presence

logbook_sea_time_control()

Gives the inconsistencies between the sum of the sea times indicated for the route and the one indicated for the trip

logbook_species_control()

Gives the inconsistencies between species sampled and species authorized

logbook_super_sample_number_control()

Gives the inconsistencies between the sample and the subsample number

logbook_temperature_control()

Gives the inconsistencies between activity sea surface temperature and valid threshold

logbook_temporal_limit_control()

Gives the inconsistencies between trip start and end date and the dates of activity

logbook_time_route_control()

Gives the inconsistencies between the fishing times or sea times indicated for the route and activities carried out

logbook_trip_activity_control()

Gives the inconsistencies between the trip and the associated activities in terms of presence

logbook_weight_control()

Gives the inconsistencies between the sum of the weight indicated for catches and the one indicated for the activity

logbook_weight_sample_control()

Gives the inconsistencies between the sample weight (m10 and p10) and the global sample weight

logbook_weighting_control()

Gives the inconsistencies between the sample weighting and sample weight or landed weight

logbook_weighting_sample_control()

Gives the inconsistencies between the sample weighting and catch weight

logbook_well_number_control()

Gives the inconsistencies between sample well number and associated trip well numbers

marine_area_overlay_control()

Marine area overlay control function

measure_type_control()

Measure type control

measure_type_correction()

Measure type correction

more_samples_than_count_control()

More samples than count control

observed_system_vs_species_caught_control()

Observed system vs species caught control

r_table_checking()

Checking for table object

r_type_checking()

Checking for r object type

reason_for_discard_unknown_control()

Reason for discard unknown control

round_size_control()

Round size control

round_size_correction()

Round size correction

sample_with_no_fate_control()

Sample with no fate control

sample_with_no_fate_correction()

Sample with no fate correction

sex_control()

Sex control

sex_correction()

Sex correction

size_distribution_and_outliers_control()

Size distribution and outliers control

vector_comparison()

Vector comparison
